thread.title: NFL has first arrest-free month in six years
thread.title_full: NFL has first arrest-free month in six years

author: BERNIE AUGUSTINE
title: NFL has first arrest-free month in six years
text:
NFL has first arrest-free month in six years New York Daily News 11 hrs ago BERNIE AUGUSTINE © Brad Penner-USA TODAY Sports NFL commissioner Roger Goodell on the field before a game between the New York Giants and the Washington Redskins at MetLife Stadium. For the first time since since 2009 — and just the second time in Roger Goodell’s tenure — the NFL has gone a month without having one of its players arrested.
AdChoices That stat was pointed out by journalist Mike Rosenberg , citing the San Diego Union-Tribune’s NFL arrests database , which has tracked reported player arrests since 2000.
September also marked the first month in 15 years in which a player wasn’t arrested during the season.
So far this year, 33 players have been reported arrested, according to the U-T database , which also shows that there have been 807 reported player arrests since January of 2000.
Prior to September’s clean sheet, the last arrest-free month came in July of 2009.
